ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Hi! I'm Dean, an experienced developer with a passion for building beautiful, high-performing web experiences. I specialize in modern technologies and love helping businesses and creators launch standout landing pages.
PROJECTS_SUBTITLE: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently. Each one represents a unique challenge and solution.

PROJECTS_PORTFOLIO_DESC: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features smooth animations, dark mode, and a blog section with MDX support.
PROJECTS_ECOMMERCE_DESC: A full-stack e-commerce solution with Stripe payment integration, product management, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
PROJECTS_CHAT_DESC: A modern chat application with real-time messaging, file sharing, and group chat functionality using WebSocket technology.
PROJECTS_DASHBOARD_DESC: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with interactive charts, real-time data visualization, and customizable reporting tools.
PROJECTS_MOBILE_DESC: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native, featuring offline functionality and push notifications.
PROJECTS_SAAS_DESC: A subscription-based SaaS platform with user management, billing integration, and advanced analytics.
